sub_title: RAN Policy Support Officer / Junior Research Fellow at the International Centre for Counter-Terrorism (ICCT)
summary:
Radicalisation Awareness Network Policy Support (RAN PS) Project Officer and Junior Research Fellow at the International Centre for Counter-Terrorism based in The Hague, the Netherlands. Engaged with ICCT's responsibilities for the RAN PS consortium and supporting ICCT's activities through research outside the RAN consortium. My research interests are divergent, but I've increasingly begun researching and writing about right-wing extremism.

Background in Arabic Language and Culture (BA), Crisis and Security Management (MSc, cum laude) and in the final phase of my MA Middle Eastern Studies.
